<title level="1" right="Rules">[Speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=3311)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Speed is the distance a character can move using a single action, measured in feet.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
